trans-unit.source: Get set up
trans-unit.target: Get set up

trans-unit.source: It's easier than you think to get set up.
trans-unit.target: It's easier than you think to get set up.

trans-unit.source: Follow these instructions and start creating Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Follow these instructions and start creating Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Get set up
trans-unit.target: Get set up

trans-unit.source: It's easier than you think to get set up.
trans-unit.target: It's easier than you think to get set up.

trans-unit.source: Follow these instructions and start creating Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Follow these instructions and start creating Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: 1. Get Windows 10
trans-unit.target: 1. Get Windows 10

trans-unit.source: To develop UWP apps, you need the latest version of Windows.
trans-unit.target: To develop UWP apps, you need the latest version of Windows.

trans-unit.source: Get Windows 10 online
trans-unit.target: Get Windows 10 online

trans-unit.source: Are you an MSDN subscriber?
trans-unit.target: Are you an MSDN subscriber?

trans-unit.source: You can get ISO downloads here:
trans-unit.target: You can get ISO downloads here:

trans-unit.source: Get Windows 10 from [MSDN Subscriber Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=266384)
trans-unit.target: Get Windows 10 from [MSDN Subscriber Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=266384)

trans-unit.source: 2. Download or update Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: 2. Download or update Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Visual Studio 2015 helps you design, code, test, and debug your apps.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Visual Studio 2015 helps you design, code, test, and debug your apps.

trans-unit.source: If you don't already have Visual Studio 2015, click this link to install the free Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2015.
trans-unit.target: If you don't already have Visual Studio 2015, click this link to install the free Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2015.

trans-unit.source: This download includes device and phone simulators for testing your apps:
trans-unit.target: This download includes device and phone simulators for testing your apps:

trans-unit.source: Download Windows 10 developer tools
trans-unit.target: Download Windows 10 developer tools

trans-unit.source: 3. Enable your device for development
trans-unit.target: 3. Enable your device for development

trans-unit.source: It’s important to test your UWP apps on a real PCs and phones.
trans-unit.target: It’s important to test your UWP apps on a real PCs and phones.

trans-unit.source: Before you can deploy apps to your PC or Windows Phone, you have to enable it for development.
trans-unit.target: Before you can deploy apps to your PC or Windows Phone, you have to enable it for development.

trans-unit.source: For detailed instructions, see [Enable your device for development](enable-your-device-for-development.md).
trans-unit.target: For detailed instructions, see [Enable your device for development](enable-your-device-for-development.md).

trans-unit.source: 4. Register as an app developer
trans-unit.target: 4. Register as an app developer

trans-unit.source: You can start developing apps now, but before you can submit them to the store, you need a developer account.
trans-unit.target: You can start developing apps now, but before you can submit them to the store, you need a developer account.

trans-unit.source: To get a developer account, go to the [Sign up](sign-up.md) page.
trans-unit.target: To get a developer account, go to the [Sign up](sign-up.md) page.

trans-unit.source: What's next?
trans-unit.target: What's next?

trans-unit.source: After you've installed the tools and gotten a developer license or a developer account, use our tutorials to create your first app:
trans-unit.target: After you've installed the tools and gotten a developer license or a developer account, use our tutorials to create your first app:

trans-unit.source: [Create your first app](your-first-app.md) tutorials
trans-unit.target: [Create your first app](your-first-app.md) tutorials

trans-unit.source: Want more tools and downloads?
trans-unit.target: Want more tools and downloads?

trans-unit.source: For the complete list of tools and downloads, see [Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=285935).
trans-unit.target: For the complete list of tools and downloads, see [Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=285935).
